pokemonDescription: Get Pokemon data using GraphQL Pokemon.
pokemonDescriptionMove: Get data on the selected Pokemon move.

pokemonDetailedDescription.description: Get Pokemon data using GraphQL Pokemon.

pokemonDexNone: {{ERROR}} Whoops I couldn't resolve `{{pokemon}}` to a Pokémon, maybe you meant one of these?
pokemonDexSelect: Choose the Pokémon you want to get information about.
pokemonMoveNone: {{ERROR}} Whoops I couldn't resolve {{move}} to a Pokémon move, maybe you meant one of these?
pokemonMoveSelect: Choose the Pokémon move you want to get information about.
pokemonOptionPokemon: The name of the pokemon you want to search
pokemonOptionSprite: How the pokemon's sprite should be displayed.
pokemonOptionMove: The Pokemon move to get data on.
